title: Start
body:
Welcome to my domain. Time to master your magical abilities.
[[ Finally. |Yes]] 
[[ I actually want to switch to being a warrior. |No]]

title: Yes
body:
Press Q to fire a Fireball projectile.
[[ Awesome. |yes2]] 
[[ Can I learn a death ray? |yes2]]

title: No
body: I have no use for warriors.

title: yes2
body:
Make sure to manage your Mana resource. Otherwise you cannot use any magical attacks.
[[ True... |Yes3]] 
[[ I'd rather use my staff as a sword. |Yes3]]

title: Yes3
body: Kill the enemies ahead, and bring their remains to me. I will craft you a potion to help you later.
